titleStmt.title: The doctrine and conversation of Iohn Baptist delivered in a sermon, at a visitation holden at Baldock, in the County of Hertford : Decemb. 9. 1641. Contradicted by many of the auditors. / By Hen. Denne, an unworthy Minister of Christ Iesus, at Pyrton in Hertfordshire.
titleStmt.author: Denne, Henry, 1606 or 7-1660?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
